inboxstar.com (formarly plugnpost.com) is a  venture of Greentree Technologies. Greentree Technologies is providing IT products and services since 2010. 
inboxstar.com offers premium hosted email services to Individuals and business.

ZIMBRA Groupware based Email Account

Personal: 1 mailbox, 2000 MB storage, name@inboxstar.com - $ 7.0 /Year

All Groupware plans include Web mail, Group calendar, global address books, Sharing and collaboration and many groupware standard features.

We also have business plans choices from shared to dedicated (VPS based).
